verses.roman:
prīti-viṣayānande tad-āśrayānanda
tāṅhā nāhi nija-sukha-vāñchāra sambandha

synonyms: prīti-viṣaya-ānande—in the joy of the object of love; tat—of that love; āśraya-ānanda—the joy of the abode; tāṅhā—that; nāhi—not; nija-sukha-vāñchāra—of desire for one's own happiness; sambandha—relationship.
translation: The happiness of the abode of love is in the happiness of the object of that love. This is not a relationship of desire for personal gratification.
